title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 415 - Nursing Homes-minimum Standards
content:

State Regulations

General (§ 415.1 to 415.2)

Residential Rights and Services (§ 415.3 to 415.6 to 415.8)

Clinical Services (§ 415.11 to 415.22)

Administrative (§ 415.26 to 415.34)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 415

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§2800, 2803, 2803-c, 2803-e, 2803-h, 3612, art. 27-f, 4010

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
